channel.description: Recent content in pulumi on Matias Pan's blog

item.title: Exploring Dagger: Building a CI/CD pipeline for IaC
item.description: Dagger is a new tool that promises to fix the yaml and custom scripts mess that CI/CD currently is by building pipelines as code with one of the supported SDKs. I’m in the process of learning this tool, understanding where it may fall short and where it shines and I decided that sharing some of the exploration I do and the learnings it leaves me with would be useful. This is the first post in a series of blog posts that look at Dagger from different perspectives.
